DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) prevalence HPV type distribution among woman ≥ 20 year age attend routine cervical screening among woman ≥ 16 year age present post-natal check Kingdom Bahrain .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Prevalence Human Papillomavirus Types Women Kingdom Bahrain
DOC.criteria: Women ≥ 20 year age attend clinic routine cervical screening OR Women ≥ 16 year age present postnatal checkup Women provide cervical sample Written inform consent oralwitnessed thumb print informed consent obtain subject Referral abnormal cervical sample current visit Abundant menstrual bleeding vaginal discharge allow appropriate screening perform ( Note : Enrolment delay condition resolve ) Pregnant woman History hysterectomy Known diagnosis immunosuppression , patient immunosuppressive Having receive one dose human papillomavirus vaccine prior participate study
